subdisciplines.name: Data Journalism
subdisciplines.description: The use of data analysis techniques to uncover information and stories, often using large datasets or complex information.

subdisciplines.name: Undercover Journalism
subdisciplines.description: The practice of going undercover to gather information, often involving the use of hidden cameras or other recording devices.

subdisciplines.name: Computer-Assisted Reporting
subdisciplines.description: The use of computer programming and data analysis tools to aid in investigative reporting.
